 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_SVD_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_SVD_HPP

 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/

 17#include <algorithm>
 18
 19#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 20#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 21#include <vsip/math.hpp>
 22#include <vsip/core/math_enum.hpp>
 23#include <vsip/core/temp_buffer.hpp>
 24#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_LAPACK
 25#  include <vsip/opt/lapack/bindings.hpp>
 26#  include <vsip/opt/lapack/svd.hpp>
 27#endif
 28#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_SAL
 29#  include <vsip/opt/sal/svd.hpp>
 30#endif

 32/***********************************************************************
 33  Declarations
 34***********************************************************************/
 35
 36namespace vsip
 37{
 38
 39namespace impl
 40{
 41
 42// List of implementation tags to consider for LU.
 43
 44typedef Make_type_list<
 45#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_SAL
 46  Mercury_sal_tag,
 47#endif
 48#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_LAPACK
 49  Lapack_tag,
 50#endif
 51  None_type // None_type is treated specially by Make_type_list, it is
 52            // not be put into the list.  Putting an explicit None_type
 53            // at the end of the list lets us put a ',' after each impl
 54            // tag.
 55  >::type Svd_type_list;
 56
 57
 58
 59// a structure to chose implementation type
 60template <typename T>
 61struct Choose_svd_impl
 62{
 63#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 64  typedef Cvsip_tag use_type;
 65  typedef Cvsip_tag type;
 66#else
 67  typedef typename Choose_solver_impl<
 68    Is_svd_impl_avail,
 69    T,
 70    Svd_type_list>::type type;
 71
 72  typedef typename ITE_Type<
 73    Type_equal<type, None_type>::value,
 74    As_type<Error_no_solver_for_this_type>,
 75    As_type<type> >::type use_type;
 76#endif
 77};
 78
 79} // namespace vsip::impl
 80
 81
 82/// SVD solver object.
 83
 84template <typename              T               = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 85	  return_mechanism_type ReturnMechanism = by_value>
 86class svd;
 87
 88template <typename T>
 89class svd<T, by_reference>
 90  : public impl::Svd_impl<T,true,typename impl::Choose_svd_impl<T>::use_type>
 91{
 92  typedef impl::Svd_impl<T,true, typename impl::Choose_svd_impl<T>::use_type>
 93    base_type;
 94
 95  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
 96public:
 97  svd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type ust, storage_type vst)
 98    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 99    : base_type(rows, cols, ust, vst)
100  {}
101
102  ~svd() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
103
104  // By-reference solvers.
105public:
106  template <typename Block0,
107	    typename Block1>
108  bool decompose(Matrix<T, Block0> m, Vector<scalar_f, Block1> dest)
109    VSIP_NOTHROW
110  { return this->impl_decompose(m, dest); }
111
112  template <mat_op_type       tr,
113	    product_side_type ps,
114	    typename          Block0,
115	    typename          Block1>
116  bool produ(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
117    VSIP_NOTHROW
118  // { return true; }
119  { return this->template impl_produ<tr, ps>(b, x); }
120
121  template <mat_op_type       tr,
122	    product_side_type ps,
123	    typename          Block0,
124	    typename          Block1>
125  bool prodv(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
126    VSIP_NOTHROW
127  { return this->template impl_prodv<tr, ps>(b, x); }
128
129  template <typename Block>
130  bool u(index_type low, index_type high, Matrix<T, Block> dest)
131    VSIP_NOTHROW
132  { return this->template impl_u(low, high, dest); }
133
134  template <typename Block>
135  bool v(index_type low, index_type high, Matrix<T, Block> dest)
136    VSIP_NOTHROW
137  { return this->template impl_v(low, high, dest); }
138};
139
140template <typename T>
141class svd<T, by_value>
142  : public impl::Svd_impl<T,true,typename impl::Choose_svd_impl<T>::use_type>
143{
144  typedef impl::Svd_impl<T,true,typename impl::Choose_svd_impl<T>::use_type>
145    base_type;
146
147  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
148public:
149  svd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type ust, storage_type vst)
150    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
151    : base_type(rows, cols, ust, vst)
152  {}
153
154  ~svd() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
155
156  // By-value solvers.
157public:
158  template <typename Block0>
159  Vector<scalar_f>
160  decompose(Matrix<T, Block0> m)
161    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
162  {
163    Vector<scalar_f> dest(this->impl_order());
164    if (!this->impl_decompose(m, dest))
165      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("svd::decompose"));
166    return dest;
167  }
168
169  template <mat_op_type       tr,
170	    product_side_type ps,
171	    typename          Block>
172  Matrix<T>
173  produ(const_Matrix<T, Block> b)
174    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
175  {
176    length_type q_rows = this->rows();
177    length_type q_cols = this->ustorage() == svd_uvfull ? this->rows() :
178                                                          this->impl_order();
179
180    length_type x_rows, x_cols;
181    if (ps == mat_lside)
182    {
183      x_rows = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? q_rows : q_cols;
184      x_cols = b.size(1);
185    }
186    else /* (ps == mat_rside) */
187    {
188      x_rows = b.size(0);
189      x_cols = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? q_cols : q_rows;
190    }
191    Matrix<T> x(x_rows, x_cols);
192    this->template impl_produ<tr, ps>(b, x);
193    return x;
194  }
195
196  template <mat_op_type       tr,
197	    product_side_type ps,
198	    typename          Block>
199  Matrix<T>
200  prodv(const_Matrix<T, Block> b)
201    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
202  { 
203    length_type vt_rows = this->vstorage() == svd_uvfull ? this->columns() :
204                                                           this->impl_order();
205    length_type vt_cols = this->columns();
206
207    length_type x_rows, x_cols;
208    if (ps == mat_lside)
209    {
210      x_rows = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? vt_cols : vt_rows;
211      x_cols = b.size(1);
212    }
213    else /* (ps == mat_rside) */
214    {
215      x_rows = b.size(0);
216      x_cols = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? vt_rows : vt_cols;
217    }
218    Matrix<T> x(x_rows, x_cols);
219    this->template impl_prodv<tr, ps>(b, x);
220    return x;
221  }
222
223  Matrix<T>
224  u(index_type low, index_type high)
225    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
226  {
227    assert((this->ustorage() == svd_uvpart && high <= this->impl_order()) ||
228	   (this->ustorage() == svd_uvfull && high <= this->rows()));
229
230    Matrix<T> dest(this->rows(), high - low + 1);
231    if (!this->template impl_u(low, high, dest))
232      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("svd::u"));
233    return dest;
234  }
235
236  Matrix<T>
237  v(index_type low, index_type high)
238    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
239  {
240    assert((this->vstorage() == svd_uvpart && high <= this->impl_order()) ||
241	   (this->vstorage() == svd_uvfull && high <= this->columns()));
242
243    Matrix<T> dest(this->columns(), high - low + 1);
244    if (!this->template impl_v(low, high, dest))
245      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("svd::v"));
246    return dest;
247  }
248};
249
250} // namespace vsip
251
252#endif // VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_SVD_HPP
